article_title: ObamaCare Raises Health Insurance Premiums, Especially For The Young

article_metadata.description: The Affordable Care Act has dramatically increased the cost of buying a health insurance plan on the individual market in California, Texas, Florida, New York, Illinois, Georgia, and North Carolina, states that account for more than half of America's uninsured adults, according to a study by Sector & Sovereign, a [...]
article_metadata.author: Matthew Herper
